tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:pt presents with 2 weeks history of mild diarrhea. patient also reports mild flatulence, mild abdominal pain, Stomach. patient is a 42 YO M programmer. o:Height 68 in, Weight 204 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = LUQ tenderness and rebound tenderness, Heart = RRR, loud S2 a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered Glucose, Serum.
